sn22.45:1.5: yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.45:1.6: Evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya passato cittam virajjati vimuccati anupadaya asavehi.
sn22.45:1.13: yadanatta tam ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.45:1.14: Evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya passato cittam virajjati vimuccati anupadaya asavehi.
sn22.45:1.15: Rupadhatuya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cittam virattam vimuttam hoti anupadaya asavehi, vedanadhatuya …pe…
sn22.45:1.18: vinnanadhatuya ce, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cittam virattam vimuttam hoti anupadaya asavehi.
sn22.45:1.19: Vimuttatta thitam. Thitatta santusitam. Santusitatta na paritassati. Aparitassam paccattanneva parinibbayati.
sn22.45:1.20: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
